subject: Women
Rowing
Deaths (Obituaries)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Ernestine Bayer founded a pioneering women’s rowing club in 1938, rowed competitively into her 90’s and became known as the mother of women’s rowing
snippet: Ernestine Bayer founded a pioneering women’s rowing club in 1938, rowed competitively into her 90’s and became known as the mother of women’s rowing
